basics.name: Shubham Joshi
basics.label: Data Scientist with expertise in AI technologies
basics.summary: Passionate about building innovative solutions and contributing to Data world. Experienced in Data Science with a focus on modern AI technologies.

work.name: Sutra AI (StringVentures)
work.summary: Working on creating data pipelines and optimising python code by implementing LLMs
responsibilities: Developed LLM-based functions to enhance automation and decision-making capabilities in AI-driven applications.
Optimized and built data pipelines and databases, improving data flow efficiency and scalability for real-time processing.
Migrated VBA code to Python and created comprehensive documentation, reducing processing time and improving client support.

work.name: InfoOrigin.INC
work.summary: Gained expertise in LLMs, transformers, and data science through hands-on implementation, dashboard reviews, and structured learning.
responsibilities: Implemented transformers using PyTorch, Hugging Face, and LlamaIndex for AI applications.
Completed courses on Python, Data Science, Machine Learning, and Hugging Face Agents.
Reviewed LLM response dashboards and conducted chart story analysis for AI evaluation.

work.name: CSIR National Aerospace Labrotaries (NAL), Bengaluru
work.summary: Designed and developed a UAV for surveillance and monitoring applications.
responsibilities: Designed a surveillance system for UAVs to improve stability and accuracy.
Used data-driven insights to enhance UAV performance and innovation.

work.name: Personifwy {Microsoft Certified}
work.summary: Designed and developed a Chatbot for a startup using LLMs and transformers.
responsibilities: Developed a Chatbot using LLMs and transformers for a startup, enhancing user interaction and support.
Implemented a recommendation system using LLMs and transformers, improving user experience and engagement.

education.institution: Indian Institute of Information Technology Jabalpur

awards.title: Jensys 2023 Student Ambassador
awards.awarder: AFS India, AFS Japan and Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Japan
awards.summary: Invited as a Indian representative and speaker at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Japan. Delivered a lightning talk on my journey in Japan and conducted a live disscussions showcasing the Indian culture in Japan.

awards.title: Drone Development Challenge Winner
awards.summary: Developed a high-performance UAV, winning the Drone Development Challenge through advanced aerodynamics and CFD analysis.

projects.name: CLOD
highlights: Automates the creation of personalized cold emails by analyzing job descriptions.
Extracts key details using GROQ, matches relevance with Chroma DB, and generates drafts with Llama 3.1.
Allows customization of tone and content to align with different job applications.
Simplifies the job application process by requiring only a job description link.

projects.name: TextGen
projects.description: A Multi Modal LLM based tool used to genrate step by step instruction
highlights: Developed React-based frontend for a TextGen web app, creating an intuitive and responsive user interface
Utilized MultiModal LLM Google Gemini for genrating response from screenshots, ensuring scalability and optimal performance
Implemented robust features, including step-by-step instructions, image recognition, and text generation

projects.name: NL2SQL
projects.description: A Natural Language to SQL query generator
highlights: Developed a Natural Language to SQL query generator using LLMs
Implemented a user-friendly interface for seamless interaction
Utilized advanced NLP techniques to ensure accurate query generation
